description.0: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.

0.0: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates <cryo>6</cryo> Energy for each seed consumed.

1.0: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates <cryo>7.5</cryo> Energy for each seed consumed.
